LanguageData.LetterNecronomiconInstalled: {PAWN_labelShort} has read from the Necronomicon! Now a necrarch, {PAWN_pronoun} wields mastery over the undead, poised to raise and command them.
LanguageData.LetterBloodChaliceInstalled: {PAWN_labelShort} has drank from a Blood Chalice! Now a sanguinmage, {PAWN_pronoun} wields mastery over creatures of the night, poised to create and command them.
